Reviews.Content: wife absolutely loved venice christmas 2012 trip staff unfriendly unhelpful tiny tv pc monitor positive regards hotel locationand outside hotel enjoyed city definately return venice spend extra money hotel improve overall experience

Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights hotel beautiful venice hotel popular venice venetian newspaper office people hotel located heart venice perfect eat shop party stroll restaurant attached guy manages owns hotel simply amazing nicest met venice warm looks hotel guests restaurant goers staying hotel extra touch warmth generosity pampered load complimentary desserts lemon hotel yes forget venice dont buildings using spaces stayed normal double fine bath particularly especially person hotel cleaned day maintained beware lifts hotel drawback hear buildings venice dont elevators hotel reception staff courteous helpful helped carry luggage arrived checked read review mentioned scam free trip murano casino strongly disagree remember 5 star 100 staff serving hotel limited staff hotel deal arrived checked happily arranged murano glass factory casino looking cozy centrally located hotel courteous staff regret hotel

Reviews.Title: “Just OK - big room and tiny bathroom - Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: spf1268
Reviews.Content: nice canal view balcony noise passing boats expected outdated bathroom shower constantly dripping faucet elevator prepared climbing steps breakfast adjoining restaurant dont plan lunch dinner pricey quality constant dampness mildew smell free internet sky tv english language tv channels recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “What a perfect representation of Venice!”
Reviews.Author: sandyfromgreece
Reviews.Content: hotel led believe according reviews read front desk personnel genuinely helpful european hotel laid beautifully comfortably view outside window ive experienced overlooking canal gondola parked below happy location cleanliness breakfast included atmosphere hotel worth return visit

Reviews.Title: “A Gem in the heart of Venice”
Reviews.Author: robmazz
Reviews.Content: hotel owned brothers real gem venice 40 stayed time travelling children decided stay al disappointed location ideal minutes ponte rialto piazza san marco shopping located hotel hotel housed building unless told furnished typical venetian manner adds charm hotel overlooked canal hotel pictures numerous gondolas passed window andrea fairly impressive spoke brother antonio believe occasions found helpful accomodating breakfast looked caring staff plan venice repeat hotel wish brothers continued success hotel special thanks daniele days stay help strongly recommend consider stay hotel planning venice

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights mid july cruise spacious quadruple 2 adults double 2 teenage 2 singles air con struggled pleasant stay buffet breakfast expensive location sightseeing rialto st marks left cruise sat am 10 july 17 july return late pm flight london recptionist leave luggage safe hours return saturday whilst walking venice definately practical drag friendly fine return receptionist claiming owner entertain request okd previous week insisted option leave bags trian station water taxi ride taking 30 45 minutes near port wed 35 degree heat beware dont hotel time kill day checkout forced carry luggage hotels pleased help davies family bristol england

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel great location”
Reviews.Author: wfredflw
Reviews.Content: family wife children 1411 mother 74 stayed hotel night view canal footbridge ample beds luggage hotel staff nice assisted directions map plenty suggestions hotel located main trail saint marks rialto bridge utilizing water buses instead taxis easy saving lots money st marks rialto five minute walk breakfast nice fresh breads coldcuts owner set leaving catch train ate dinner restuarant bit pricy described recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Location, Charming”
Reviews.Author: LucyGus
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect location rialto bridge water taxis san marco square breakfast quirky little restaurant dinner restaurant beautifully decorated wonderful little balcony overlooking canal nice bathroom mildew shower mattress bed updating loved hotel daniel hotelier helpful definitely stay
